law.catch_line: Notwithstanding the provisions of § 4-105 of this subtitle, a title insurer domiciled in this State...
law.text:
Notwithstanding the provisions of § 4-105 of this subtitle, a title insurer domiciled in this State shall have and maintain minimum surplus in the amount of:
$500,000 as of July 1, 2010;
$625,000 as of July 1, 2011; and
$750,000 as of July 1, 2012, and each July 1 thereafter.
